select t1.*, t2.name as class_name, t3.name as course_name, (select count(0) from lesson where schedule_id = t1.id) as lesson_count, (select group_concat(name) from staff where find_in_set(id, t1.teacher_ids)) teacher_names, (select group_concat(name) from staff where find_in_set(id, t1.assistant_ids)) assistant_names
from lesson_schedule t1 left join class t2 on t2.id = t1.class_id left join course t3 on t3.id = t2.course_id
t1.deleted != 1
AND t1.class_id = #{param.classId}
AND t1.course_id in (select id from course where lesson_type = #{param.lessonType})
order by id desc

select t1.id from lesson t1 left join lesson_teacher t2 on t2.lesson_id = t1.id
t1.date = #{date} and t1.deleted != 1 and t2.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and ( (t1.start_time <= #{startTime} and t1.end_time >= #{startTime}) or (t1.start_time <= #{endTime} and t1.end_time >= #{endTime}) )
